name: Top Down Shooter (NitroTech)
description:
This is my first game really wanted to develop this off of player feedback. Also forgive the rushed screenshots and poor quality cover Image. Let me know what you think of the art style, controls etc...

Download the .zip, extract it, launch the .exe file

Controls: Keyboard & Mouse

Need name suggestions. 

All art and programing done by me(There is no sound yet).

Shoot the eggs with LMB to spawn creatures.

NOTE: Once all eggs have been destroyed that is the end of the game you will have to close the window and launch the .exe again  to restart the game, remember prototype.

------------------------------------------------UPDATES--------------------------------------

Reworked the egg system.

Updated Cover Image
